channel.title: Node on Caffeinspiration
channel.description: Recent content in Node on Caffeinspiration

item.title: Connecting Arduino with a Node Server
item.description: Arduinode I’ve been working through the Arduino Starter Kit projects recently, and I wanted to try a new project that was outside of the pre-made booklet. Working with an offline Arduino (intranet of things?) has let me learn a great deal, and I wanted to see how difficult it would be to connect my Arduino to a simple Node server, which would get me ready to connect it in any future projects.
